pullRequest.title: Standardize Template Substitutions for Join definition
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Trim column references in HJSON config for field definitions.
Validate join definition in hjson config
Use {{..}} for column references in join definition i.e. {{col1}} = {{joinField.col2}} instead of %from.col1 = %join.col2
Allow physical column references from referred table in parent table.
Also resolves: #1548
How Has This Been Tested?
Existing Tests Pass.
Additional Unit Tests
License
I confirm that this contribution is made under an Apache 2.0 license and that I have the authority necessary to make this contribution on behalf of its copyright owner.

nodes.bodyText:
This works a little different than how other references are resolved.  The SQLReferenceVisitor is normally called at service start and all the references are saved off in the SQLReferenceTable.  From that point onward, only lookups happen in the reference table.
Is there any reason we can't follow the same approach here?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -268,14 +270,29 @@ private String extractJoinClause(Class<?> fromClass,
                         dictionary.getAnnotatedColumnName(
                                 joinClass,
                                 dictionary.getIdFieldName(joinClass)))
-                : extractJoinExpression(join.value(), fromAlias, joinAlias);
+                : getJoinClause(fromClass, fromAlias, joinClass, joinAlias, join.value());
 
         return String.format("LEFT JOIN %s AS %s ON %s",
                 joinSource,
                 joinAlias,
                 joinClause);
     }
 
+    /**
+     * Resolve references to construct a join ON clause.
+     *
+     * @param fromClass parent class
+     * @param fromAlias parent alias
+     * @param joinClass join class
+     * @param joinAlias join alias
+     * @param expr unresolved ON clause
+     * @return string resolved ON clause
+     */
+    private String getJoinClause(Class<?> fromClass, String fromAlias, Class<?> joinClass, String joinAlias,
+                    String expr) {
+        SQLReferenceVisitor visitor = new SQLReferenceVisitor(referenceTable.getMetaDataStore(), fromAlias);

nodes.bodyText: Since we don't know the field type, we could make it Object.class.
I'd prefer is this class was kept private to the construction of the SQLReferenceTable.

commit.message: Standardize template substitutions for Join Expressions
Allow physical column references from referred table in parent table.
Resolve join expressions during service start
